methods.name: starknet_getBlockWithTxHashes
methods.summary: Get block information with transaction hashes given the block id

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The resulting block information with transaction hashes

schema.title: Starknet get block hash with tx hashes result

methods.name: starknet_getBlockWithTxs
methods.summary: Get block information with full transactions given the block id

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The resulting block information with full transactions

schema.title: Starknet get block with txs result

methods.name: starknet_getStateUpdate
methods.summary: Get the information about the result of executing the requested block

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The information about the state update of the requested block

methods.name: starknet_getStorageAt
methods.summary: Get the value of the storage at the given address and key

params.name: contract_address
params.description: The address of the contract to read from
params.summary: The address of the contract to read from

params.name: key
params.description: The key to the storage value for the given contract
params.summary: The key to the storage value for the given contract

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The value at the given key for the given contract. 0 if no value is found
result.summary: The value at the given key for the given contract.

methods.name: starknet_getTransactionByHash
methods.summary: Get the details and status of a submitted transaction

params.name: transaction_hash
params.summary: The hash of the requested transaction

methods.name: starknet_getTransactionByBlockIdAndIndex
methods.summary: Get the details of a transaction by a given block id and index
methods.description: Get the details of the transaction given by the identified block and index in that block. If no transaction is found, null is returned.

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: index
params.summary: The index in the block to search for the transaction

methods.name: starknet_getTransactionReceipt
methods.summary: Get the transaction receipt by the transaction hash

params.name: transaction_hash
params.summary: The hash of the requested transaction

methods.name: starknet_getClass
methods.summary: Get the contract class definition in the given block associated with the given hash

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: class_hash
params.description: The hash of the requested contract class

methods.name: starknet_getClassHashAt
methods.summary: Get the contract class hash in the given block for the contract deployed at the given address

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: contract_address
params.description: The address of the contract whose class hash will be returned

result.name: result
result.description: The class hash of the given contract

methods.name: starknet_getClassAt
methods.summary: Get the contract class definition in the given block at the given address

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: contract_address
params.description: The address of the contract whose class definition will be returned

methods.name: starknet_getBlockTransactionCount
methods.summary: Get the number of transactions in a block given a block id
methods.description: Returns the number of transactions in the designated block.

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The number of transactions in the designated block
result.summary: The number of transactions in the designated block

methods.name: starknet_call
methods.summary: call a starknet function without creating a StarkNet transaction
methods.description: Calls a function in a contract and returns the return value.  Using this call will not create a transaction; hence, will not change the state

params.name: request
params.summary: The details of the function call

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag, for the block referencing the state or call the transaction on.

result.name: result
result.description: The function's return value, as defined in the Cairo output

methods.name: starknet_estimateFee
methods.summary: estimate the fee for of StarkNet transactions
methods.description: estimates the resources required by transactions when applied on a given state

schema.description: a sequence of transactions to estimate, running each transaction on the state resulting from applying all the previous ones
schema.title: Broadcasted transaction

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag, for the block referencing the state or call the transaction on.

schema.title: Estimation
schema.description: a sequence of fee estimatione where the i'th estimate corresponds to the i'th transaction

methods.name: starknet_blockNumber
methods.summary: Get the most recent accepted block number

methods.name: starknet_blockHashAndNumber
methods.summary: Get the most recent accepted block hash and number

result.name: result
result.description: The latest block hash and number

schema.title: Starknet block hash and number result

methods.name: starknet_chainId
methods.summary: Return the currently configured StarkNet chain id

result.name: result
result.description: The chain id this node is connected to

methods.name: starknet_pendingTransactions
methods.summary: Returns the transactions in the transaction pool, recognized by this sequencer

methods.name: starknet_syncing
methods.summary: Returns an object about the sync status, or false if the node is not synching

result.name: syncing
result.summary: The state of the synchronization, or false if the node is not synchronizing
result.description: The status of the node, if it is currently synchronizing state. FALSE otherwise

oneOf.title: False
oneOf.description: only legal value is FALSE here

methods.name: starknet_getEvents
methods.summary: Returns all events matching the given filter
methods.description: Returns all event objects matching the conditions in the provided filter

params.name: filter
params.summary: The conditions used to filter the returned events

result.name: events
result.description: All the event objects matching the filter

methods.name: starknet_getNonce
methods.summary: Get the nonce associated with the given address in the given block

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: contract_address
params.description: The address of the contract whose nonce we're seeking

result.name: result
result.description: The last nonce used for the given contract.

continuation_token.title: Continuation token
continuation_token.description: Use this token in a subsequent query to obtain the next page. Should not appear if there are no more pages.

continuation_token.title: Continuation token
continuation_token.description: The token returned from the previous query. If no token is provided the first page is returned.

EMITTED_EVENT.title: Emitted event
EMITTED_EVENT.description: Event information decorated with metadata on where it was emitted / An event emitted as a result of transaction execution

block_hash.title: Block hash
block_hash.description: The hash of the block in which the event was emitted

block_number.title: Block number
block_number.description: The number of the block in which the event was emitted

transaction_hash.title: Transaction hash
transaction_hash.description: The transaction that emitted the event

keys.title: Keys
keys.description: The values used to filter the events

items.title: Keys
items.description: Per key (by position), designate the possible values to be matched for events to be returned. Empty array designates 'any' value

BLOCK_TAG.title: Block tag
BLOCK_TAG.description: A tag specifying a dynamic reference to a block

SYNC_STATUS.title: Sync status
SYNC_STATUS.description: An object describing the node synchronization status

starting_block_hash.title: Starting block hash
starting_block_hash.description: The hash of the block from which the sync started

starting_block_num.title: Starting block number
starting_block_num.description: The number (height) of the block from which the sync started

current_block_hash.title: Current block hash
current_block_hash.description: The hash of the current block being synchronized

current_block_num.title: Current block number
current_block_num.description: The number (height) of the current block being synchronized

highest_block_hash.title: Highest block hash
highest_block_hash.description: The hash of the estimated highest block to be synchronized

highest_block_num.title: Highest block number
highest_block_num.description: The number (height) of the estimated highest block to be synchronized

NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex
NUM_AS_HEX.description: An integer number in hex format (0x...)

CHAIN_ID.title: Chain id
CHAIN_ID.description: StarkNet chain id, given in hex representation.

state_diff.description: The change in state applied in this block, given as a mapping of addresses to the new values and/or new contracts

items.description: The changes in the storage per contract address

class_hash.description: The hash of the declared class

items.description: A new contract deployed as part of the state update

STORAGE_KEY.title: Storage key

ETH_ADDRESS.title: Ethereum address

TXN_HASH.description: The transaction hash, as assigned in StarkNet

FELT.title: Field element
FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
